trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Schererville
There were no other sightings in Schererville on or around July 5th 2009
divs: sighting detailsmy husband, son and i were on our way home around 10:30 p.m. and we were watching fireworks in the sky when we saw something just floating in the sky. it was in the west sky from us toward illinois (we live on the border of indiana\illinois). it was actually beautiful. it was low in the sky and if i had to guess i would say it was the size of a car. it looked like a gem - it was glowing amber\red and had flickers to it. by the time we pulled in the driveway, it dimmed and just disappeared. it was definitely not fireworks. we all thought it was amazing.
